parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
heck for below Scenario from Application Data Capture
1)Scenario: Verify whether system validate for  Exclsuion Wordings if UWR user select decision as Accept with exclusion.
If member has no declared PED and age is less than 55 years. 
2) Product Name : Aarogya sanjeevani
3) Policy Plan :  Non Family Floater
4) Business Type : New Business
5) Members : 2A (Self + Spouse)
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  :  
Self : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac, all type of fracture --> Decision - Accept with exclusion and Loading and take loading as "0"
Spouse : 35 age ,SI : 2Lac,other impariant -->Decision - Accept with exclusion
Father : 54 age ,SI : 2Lac,
7)Trigger point: > System should show Exclusion wordings text filed is mandatory and Validate M2 for loading 
8) VP:System show Exclusion wordings text filed is mandatory ith Asterisk Sign and Validate M2 for loading
